pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhātuno saddhivihārikassa bhikkhuno sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.3: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.4: “ayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ sāmaṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.5: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.6: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.7: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.10: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.12: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.13: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.18: channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.20: dve vikappanā— sammukhāvikappanā ca parammukhāvikappanā ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.25: Tena vattabbo— “ko te mitto vā sandiṭṭho vā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.27: Tena vattabbo— “ahaṃ tesaṃ dammi, tesaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.29: tassa vā adinnaṃ, tassa vā avissasanto paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.2.4: Adhiṭṭheti vā vissajjeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
